entry.title: 11 December 2020
entry.content: Denis Kotkov has joined the group as an FCAI funded post-doctoral researcher!

entry.title: 08 December 2020
entry.content: We had a long paper accepted at CHIIR 2021, based on work by Jing Li during her MSc thesis. Well done!

entry.title: 02 December 2020
entry.content: Congratulations to Yu An for completing her MSc!

entry.title: 17 November 2020
entry.content: Congratulations to Jaana Louhio for completing her MSc!

entry.title: 02 November 2020
entry.content: Please submit your articles to our IUI 2021 workshop on Exploratory Search and Interactive Data Analytics, virtual! Please see the call for papers on the ESIDA website for details.

entry.title: 25 September 2020
entry.content: Andrea and Dorota gave a tutorial on Bandit Algorithms in Recommender Systems at RecSys 2020.

entry.title: 18 June 2020
entry.content: We have received funding from Business Finland and M-Brain for a 1 year project entitled “Summarizing Search Results with Dynamic Exploratory Search Captions”.

entry.title: 16 June 2020
entry.content: Congratulations to Jing Li and Ivan Kropotov for completing their MSc degrees!

entry.title: 08 June 2020
entry.content: Congratulations to Dr Arlene Casey for obtaining her PhD degree with her thesis entitled: LitCrit: Explorating Intentions as a basis for Automated Feedback on Related Work.

entry.title: 01 June 2020
entry.content: Welcome to Daniel Koch who has joined the group as a summer intern!

entry.title: 01 April 2020
entry.content: Yang Liu has re-joined the group as a PhD student!

entry.title: 01 April 2020
entry.content: Welcome to Ivan Kropotov who has joined the group as a summer intern!

entry.title: 25 February 2020
entry.content: Congratulations to Yang Liu for completing her MSc!

entry.title: 13 February 2020
entry.content: Invited paper on user behaviour and search engine adaptation in exploratory search published in ACM SIGWEB newsletter.

entry.title: 28 November 2019
entry.content: Alan and Dorota were invited to give a seminar talk called Manuscripts and newspapers: Using machine learning to map the sciences and identify political bias at Language Technology, University of Helsinki.

entry.title: 24 November 2019
entry.content: Andrea Barraza from the Insight Centre for Data Analytics, National University of Ireland, Galway is visiting ESP group from 24/11-08/12.

entry.title: 22 November 2019
entry.content: Dorota gave a talk called Bandit algorithms in information retrieval and recommender systems at the Nokia AI seminar.

entry.title: 15 November 2019
entry.content: Dorota was invited to give an invited talk entitled Don’t search, explore: supporting scientific literature exploration for the 90th anniversary of the Finnish research library association.

entry.title: 04 October 2019
entry.content: Alan and Dorota were invited to give a seminar talk called Discovering new patterns in scientific literature and news data at the Helsinki Centre for Digital Humanities (HELDIG) pizza seminar.

entry.title: 19 September 2019
entry.content: Dorota gave a tutorial on Bandit Algorithms in Recommender Systems at RecSys 2019 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
